creditline: Gift of Henry and Frieda Neils
description: silk and rayon(fortisan), two pieced panels, plain weave, silk screened print, copper-colored background with circle, ovoid and line design elements silk screened in white, tan, orange and gold, fully lined with original pleating and hooks Design 104 from the Taliesin Line, c. 1954
title: Door Drape
